segments.text: Welcome to Aether Mail. This is the first screen users encounter when accessing our platform. Let me walk you through the account creation process.
To create an account, users first review and accept our terms of service. The system then generates secure credentials automatically.
These generated credentials are cryptographically secure. Users download their private key, which is required for platform access. This ensures complete control over authentication.
Now I'll demonstrate the login process using the credentials we just generated.
After authentication, users arrive at the main dashboard. This is the central hub for all email management features.
The dashboard provides access to our core features. Most importantly, it handles external email account aggregation.
External account management is the foundation of our platform. Users connect multiple email providers to consolidate everything in one secure location.
We support all major email providers including Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, and custom IMAP servers. This allows complete email consolidation regardless of provider.
I'll demonstrate by connecting my Gmail account to show the integration process.

For security, most providers require application-specific passwords rather than your main account password. We've included direct links to each provider's app password generation page to simplify this process.
